mapper.select: SELECT TAG_ID as tagId ,TAG_NAME as tagName ,'main' as type FROM TB_TAG_MASTER

SELECT DISTINCT REVIEW_ID AS cardId FROM TB_REVIEW_TAG
WHERE TAG_ID IN
#{tagId}
ORDER BY REVIEW_ID DESC

SELECT TRM.REVIEW_ID as reviewId ,TRM.REVIEW_CONTENT as review ,TSM.STORE_NAME as storeName ,TUM.NAME as userName ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_IMAGE_MASTER TIM WHERE TRM.REVIEW_ID = TIM.REVIEW_ID) AS imageCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPLY_MASTER TRPM WHERE TRM.REVIEW_ID = TRPM.REVIEW_ID ) AS replyCount FROM TB_REVIEW_MASTER TRM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STORE_MASTER TSM ON TRM.STORE_ID = TSM.STORE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_IMAGE_MASTER TIM ON TRM.REVIEW_ID = TIM.REVIEW_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_MASTER TUM ON TRM.USER_ID = TUM.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_REPLY_MASTER TRPM ON TRM.REVIEW_ID = TRPM.REVIEW_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TRM.REVIEW_ID = #{id}
SELECT IMAGE_DATA as imageData ,MIMETYPE as mimetype FROM TB_IMAGE_MASTER TIM WHERE 1=1 AND TIM.REVIEW_ID = #{id} AND TIM.IMAGE_SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY IMAGE_SEQ ASC

SELECT TRT.TAG_ID as tagId ,TTM.TAG_NAME as tagName ,NVL((SELECT 'selected' FROM TB_USER_REVIEW_TAG TURT WHERE TRT.REVIEW_ID = TURT.REVIEW_ID AND TTM.TAG_ID = TURT.TAG_ID AND TURT.USER_ID = #{userId} ), '') AS likes ,'card' as type FROM TB_REVIEW_TAG TRT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_TAG_MASTER TTM ON TRT.TAG_ID = TTM.TAG_ID WHERE TRT.REVIEW_ID = #{id}
SELECT USER_ID as userId ,REPLY_CONTENT as replyContent ,REVIEW_ID as reviewId FROM TB_REPLY_MASTER WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{id} ORDER BY DATA_INS_DATE DESC
SELECT TAG_ID as tagId ,TAG_NAME as tagName ,'add' as type FROM TB_TAG_MASTER
